content:
# Richmedia Temple Server [![Travis](https://img.shields.io/travis/mediamonks/richmedia-temple-server.svg)](https://travis-ci.org/mediamonks/richmedia-temple-server) [![npm](https://img.shields.io/npm/v/@mediamonks/richmedia-temple-server.svg?maxAge=2592000)](https://www.npmjs.com/package/@mediamonks/richmedia-temple-server) [![npm](https://img.shields.io/npm/dm/@mediamonks/richmedia-temple-server.svg?maxAge=2592000)](https://www.npmjs.com/package/@mediamonks/richmedia-temple-server)

Richmedia Temple Server is used as a tool to build and develop richmedia units.

See documentation http://mediamonks.github.io/richmedia-temple-server/

## Installation

```sh
yarn add @mediamonks/richmedia-temple-server
```

```sh
npm i -S @mediamonks/richmedia-temple-server
```

## Basic Usasage

```js
// for building
rds-build

// for developing
rds-dev
```


maybe use [@mediamonks/generator-richmedia-temple](https://github.com/mediamonks/generator-richmedia-temple) for creating your setup automatically.

## Documentation

View the [documentation](http://mediamonks.github.io/richmedia-temple-server/).

## Contribute

View [CONTRIBUTING.md](./CONTRIBUTING.md)


## Changelog

View [CHANGELOG.md](./CHANGELOG.md)


## Authors

View [AUTHORS.md](./AUTHORS.md)


## LICENSE

[MIT](./LICENSE) © MediaMonks
name: ./README.md

content:
{
  "name": "@mediamonks/richmedia-temple-server",
  "version": "6.0.2",
  "description": "This is the Richmedia Temple, used for creating richmedia units for various vendors.",
  "scripts": {
    "dev": "rds-dev",
    "build": "rds-build",
    "doc": "node_modules/.bin/esdoc",
    "lint": "npm-run-all lint:*",
    "lint:js": "eslint src --ext .js --cache",
    "prettify": "prettier --write \"src/**/*.{js,json}\"",
    "test": "mocha",
    "build:all_all": "rds-build --glob './**/.richmediarc*' --choices 'eyJlbXB0eUJ1aWxkRGlyIjp0cnVlLCJidWlsZCI6WyIuL3ByZXZpZXcvMzAweDI1MC8ucmljaG1lZGlhcmMuZW4iLCIuL3ByZXZpZXcvMzAweDI1MC8ucmljaG1lZGlhcmMubmwiLCIuL3ByZXZpZXcvMzAweDI1MC8ucmljaG1lZGlhcmMuZXMiLCIuL3ByZXZpZXcvMzAweDI1MC8ucmljaG1lZGlhcmMuZGUiLCIuL3ByZXZpZXcvMzAweDI1MC8ucmljaG1lZGlhcmMuY2FyIl19'"
  },
  "bin": {
    "rds-dev": "dev.js",
    "rds-build": "build.js"
  },
  "main": "index.js",
  "lint-staged": {
    "linters": {
      "src/**/*.{js,json}": [
        "prettier --write",
        "git add"
      ],
      "src/**/*.js": [
        "npm run lint:js"
      ]
    }
  },
  "pre-push": [
    "validate"
  ],
  "repository": {
    "type": "git",
    "url": "git+https://github.com/mediamonks/temple.git"
  },
  "publishConfig": {
    "access": "public"
  },
  "author": "Mient-jan Stelling",
  "license": "MIT",
  "bugs": {
    "url": "https://github.com/mediamonks/temple/issues"
  },
  "homepage": "https://github.com/mediamonks/richmedia-temple#readme",
  "devDependencies": {
    "@mediamonks/temple": "^4.0.3",
    "@types/chai": "^4.2.12",
    "@types/mocha": "^2.2.44",
    "@types/sinon": "^4.1.2",
    "@types/sinon-chai": "^2.7.37",
    "babel-plugin-istanbul": "^6.0.0",
    "chai": "^4.1.2",
    "coveralls": "^3.1.0",
    "cross-env": "^5.2.1",
    "esdoc": "^1.1.0",
    "esdoc-ecmascript-proposal-plugin": "^1.0.0",
    "esdoc-standard-plugin": "^1.0.0",
    "eslint": "^4.13.1",
    "eslint-config-airbnb-base": "^12.1.0",
    "eslint-config-prettier": "^2.9.0",
    "eslint-friendly-formatter": "^3.0.0",
    "eslint-import-resolver-typescript": "^1.0.2",
    "eslint-plugin-import": "^2.22.0",
    "eslint-plugin-prettier": "^2.4.0",
    "husky": "^0.14.3",
    "jsdom": "^11.5.1",
    "jsdom-global": "^3.0.2",
    "lint-staged": "^6.0.0",
    "mocha": "^8.1.1",
    "npm-run-all": "^4.1.3",
    "nyc": "^15.1.0",
    "prettier": "^1.19.1",
    "shx": "^0.2.2",
    "sinon": "^4.1.3",
    "sinon-chai": "^2.14.0",
    "svg-inline-loader": "^0.8.2"
  },
  "dependencies": {
    "@babel/cli": "^7.10.5",
    "@babel/core": "^7.11.1",
    "@babel/plugin-proposal-class-properties": "^7.10.4",
    "@babel/plugin-proposal-decorators": "^7.10.5",
    "@babel/plugin-syntax-dynamic-import": "^7.8.3",
    "@babel/plugin-transform-async-to-generator": "^7.10.4",
    "@babel/polyfill": "^7.10.4",
    "@babel/preset-env": "^7.11.0",
    "@babel/register": "^7.10.5",
    "@mediamonks/richmedia-temple-screenshot": "^1.2.0",
    "ajv": "^6.12.4",
    "babel-eslint": "^8.0.3",
    "babel-loader": "^8.1.0",
    "browserslist": "^4.14.0",
    "caniuse-lite": "^1.0.30001116",
    "chalk": "^2.4.2",
    "circular-dependency-plugin": "^5.2.0",
    "cli-spinner": "^0.2.8",
    "copy-webpack-plugin": "^6.0.3",
    "core-js": "^3.6.5",
    "css-loader": "^1.0.0",
    "cssnano": "^4.1.0",
    "deepmerge": "^3.2.0",
    "express": "^4.17.1",
    "extract-loader": "^2.0.1",
    "file-loader": "^1.1.11",
    "fs-extra": "^6.0.1",
    "gamefroot-texture-packer": "^1.1.2",
    "glob": "^7.1.4",
    "glob-promise": "^3.4.0",
    "google-spreadsheet": "^3.0.13",
    "handlebars": "^4.7.6",
    "html-loader": "^0.5.5",
    "html-webpack-plugin": "^3.2.0",
    "image-webpack-loader": "^4.3.1",
    "inquirer": "^6.5.2",
    "loader-utils": "^1.4.0",
    "md5-file": "^4.0.0",
    "mini-css-extract-plugin": "^0.5.0",
    "node-sass": "^4.14.1",
    "opener": "^1.5.1",
    "portfinder": "^1.0.28",
    "postcss-css-variables": "^0.17.0",
    "postcss-import": "^12.0.0",
    "postcss-loader": "^3.0.0",
    "postcss-media-variables": "^2.0.1",
    "postcss-nested": "^4.2.3",
    "postcss-preset-env": "^5.3.0",
    "promise-polyfill": "^8.1.3",
    "resolve-url-loader": "^3.1.1",
    "s3-batch-upload": "^1.3.0",
    "sass-loader": "^7.3.1",
    "schema-utils": "^1.0.0",
    "simple-progress-webpack-plugin": "^1.1.2",
    "sketch-loader": "^0.1.2",
    "ssh2-sftp-client": "^2.5.2",
    "style-loader": "^0.23.0",
    "svgo": "^1.3.2",
    "svgo-loader": "^2.2.1",
    "terser-webpack-plugin": "^1.4.5",
    "tunnel-agent": "^0.6.0",
    "uglify-js": "^3.10.1",
    "uglifyjs-webpack-plugin": "2.1.2",
    "url-loader": "^1.1.2",
    "uuidv4": "^3.0.1",
    "webpack": "^4.44.1",
    "webpack-bundle-analyzer": "^3.8.0",
    "webpack-dev-middleware": "^3.7.2",
    "webpack-hot-middleware": "^2.25.0",
    "webpack-virtual-modules": "^0.2.2",
    "webpack-visualizer-plugin": "^0.1.11",
    "whatwg-fetch": "^2.0.4",
    "zip-webpack-plugin": "^3.0.0"
  }
}
name: package.json
